analysis.description:
DDDico.fetchRate (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#288-314) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- DDDico.applicableRate

ERC20Token (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#86-213) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#140-153)

DDDico.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#260-275) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferICO(msg.sender,tok) (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#270-273)

DDDico.block0 should be constant (/unique_chucks/44/0x76e7da54f22728f7f5afa35f974419ae9f41ba94.sol#229)
